title: VAX Air Stretch Pet Max
description:
Powerful and lightweight.
No loss of suction.*
A rated for energy, A rated for hardfloor pick-up, A rated for carpet pick-up and A rated for emissions.
Extra-long 13m cord and 3.6m hose.
TurboTool – suitable for stairs, upholstery and homes with pets.

 
The Vax Air Stretch Pet Max U85-AS-Pme is a powerful and lightweight upright vacuum cleaner with an extra-long 13 M cord and 3.6 M reach hose. It’s also suitable for homes with pets.
The Vax Air Stretch Pet is a powerful multi-cyclonic upright vacuum cleaner with no loss of suction*. It’s rated A rated for energy, A rated for hardfloor pick-up, A rated for carpet pick-up and A rated for emissions. This upright vacuum cleaner also weighs only 4.9 Kg in use making it easy to lift up and down stairs.
The Air Stretch Pet Max has a long extension hose for easy stair cleaning and a long cord for less frequent plugging and unplugging. This extensive 17 M reach is appropriate for completing a total home clean.
The 3-in-1 tool features a crevice, upholstery and dusting tool for an effortless clean around the home. It also has an on board TurboTool that’s ideal for stairs, upholstery and homes with pets.
No loss of suction*- Per IEC60312-1 1st Edition, 5.9. Machine must be maintained as per instructed in the user guide. Tested to max fill line.
 
 
Multi-cyclonic technology
The Vax Air Stretch Pet U85-AS-Pe has powerful multi-cyclonic technology with no loss of suction* across both carpets and hard floors.
 
Lightweight
This upright vacuum cleaner also weighs only 4.9Kg in use making it easy to lift up and down stairs.
 
Long stretch hose and cord
The extra-long 3.6m hose is appropriate for stair cleaning and getting to hard to reach areas. The extra-long 13 M cord also means less frequent unplugging.
 
Ideal for pet owners
The Vax Air Stretch Pet is suitable for homes with pets. It has an on board TurboTool helps to remove embedded dirt and pet hair from stairs, upholstery and other fabrics around your home.

title: Vax Action 402 Pet Cylinder Vacuum Cleaner
description:
Compact and lightweight
Ideal for pet owners
Combination floor head
Additional tools

Compact and lightweight
The Action 402 Pet is lightweight weighing only 5kg making it easy to carry up and down stairs. It’s also compact for easy storage.
 
Ideal for pet owners
The on board TurboTool is great for removing stubborn dirt and pet hair from stairs and upholstery around your home.
 
Combination floor head
The combination floor head is perfect for cleaning carpets and hard floors as you can switch it seamlessly between the both for the best clean.
 
Additional tools
The Vax Action 402 Pet has various tools including a metal telescopic extension tube, TurboTool to remove embedded dirt and pet hair and a 3-in-1 tool for all other above the floor cleaning jobs.

title: Vax 3.0Ah ONEPWR Battery
description:
The Vax ONEPWR battery is our most advanced technology yet, and is interchangeable between the range of ONEPWR products. That means you can power the whole ONEPWR family with the same battery.

 

With an additional 3.0Ah battery for your Vax ONEPWR product, you can extend your runtime and be ready to clean for longer. Simply swap the battery for another and keep going.
